title: [机制][娱乐][半付费][SCT]ProRecipes——专业修改配方[永更][1.7-1.11]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2949848385 于 2018-4-11 18:14 编辑 


ProRecipes
专业配方简介先进的，易于使用的系统来创建物品，创建配方和管理配方。 为您的服务器创造无限的可能性，释放您的创造力。ProRecipes设计简单。 绝对没有配置文件需要更改才能正常运行。使用ProRecipes，您可以在游戏中创建具有特定物品元素（有形，无形，熔炉和多工艺）的配方。[前排提醒:下载地址在2L][PS2：插件事实上是开源的，你若买不起插件可以去github地址自己构建插件]特性ItemMeta和NBTTag具体制作。 您不再受材料限制，创造不同的标签，显示名称和NBTTags的无尽的组合。教程提示由TitleManager提供。 如果您选择不下载此文件，仍然会出现文本提示。简单的游戏GUI帮助您指导您完成每一步。物品构建器来修改显示名称，和游戏中的物品。配方编辑器，在游戏中创建有序，无序，熔炉和多工艺的配方。多工艺：使用4x4网格制作最多4个结果！配方管理员可以管理和删除游戏中的配方。配方黑名单可以禁用任何您不希望玩家能够制作的配方。这支持自定义数据值。自定义物品查看器，因此您不需要重新创建以前创建的任何物品。可以在游戏中查找食谱一个配方备份系统，所以如果有什么问题，你不会失去你珍贵的配方。配方包装系统，可快速方便地进行设置。在这里阅读更多每个配方都可以有独立的权限支持可定制的提示可以翻译成任何语言，并根据您的喜好定制信息。更新检查器在需要更新时获得通知！支持NBTTags和Mythicmobs开发者API，如果你也想有一些其他的功能。 你甚至不需要购买使用API！ 点击查看Javadocs。即时整合配方，全力支持我自己！[雾]

***加粗的内容为特别注意***指令/builditem 或 /bi  - 打开物品构建器/recipre 或 /rec  - 打开配方编辑器/recipres 或 /recs  - 打开配方管理器/recipres lookup 或 /rec lookup  - 查找配方/items 或 /it  - 打开物品查看器
权限prorecipres.createitem  - 使用物品构建器prorecipres.createrecipe  - 创建配方prorecipres.managerecipes  - 管理配方prorecipres.lookup  - 查找配方prorecipres.modifyrecipes  - 编辑配方prorecipres.viewitems  - 查看自定义物品prorecipres.takeitems  - 获得物品查看器中的物品prorecipres.createtable  - 创建多工艺配方prorecipres.notifyupdate  - 如果ProRecipres有更新，会通知有权限的玩家

如何使用   英文版教程:                 中文版教程:留空待补配置文件#如果你不使用spigot，请填'false'
spigot: true

#这里开启/关闭显示任何提示信息
showPrompts: true

＃这是配置黑名单时应该使用的格式
#从这里获取物品名称
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/org/bukkit/Material.html
＃ 使用 '!' 定义数据值
＃如果要阻止材料，请勿使用任何数据值
recipeBlacklist：
- emerald_block
- gold_block!2
- diamond_block!1
- wood!0
-  wood!1复制代码
Message.ymlItem_Viewer_Title: 物品查看器
Item_Viewer_Prompt: 单击某个材料以查看自定义项目
Item_Builder_Title: 物品构建器
Item_Builder_Insert: 插入一个所需的物品进行修改
Item_Builder_Edit: 你可以编辑这个物品
Item_Builder_Lore: 在聊天框中输入所需的物品描述
Item_Builder_Name: 在聊天框中输入所需的物品名称
Item_Builder_Done: 您的物品已经放到了你的背包中
Recipe_Builder_Title: 配方编辑器
Recipe_Builder_MultiCraft_Title: 多工艺
Recipe_Builder_MultiCraft_Add: 添加左边的成分，产物是正确的
Recipe_Builder_Empty: 你不能保存一个空的配方
Recipe_Builder_Insert: 插入所需的产物
Recipe_Builder_Add: 添加您的成分！然后关闭保存配方
添加你的资源！然后关闭保存配方
Recipe_Viewer_Title: 配方管理器
Recipe_Viewer_Title2: 配方查看器
Recipe_Viewer_Prompt: 查看和保存配方
Recipe_Viewer_Prompt2: 查看配方
Recipe_Viewer_Edited: 配方已修改
Recipe_Viewer_Deleted: 配方已删除
Furnace_Saved: 你的熔炉配方已经保存！
Shapeless_Saved: 你的无序配方已经被保存！
Shaped_Saved: 你的有序配方已经被保存！
Multi-Craft_Saved: 你的多公益配方已经被保存！
Choose_Type: 选择配方的类型
Multi_Craft_GUI: 多工艺编辑器
Mulit_Craft_Enter: 添加配方
Multi_Craft_View: 查看配方
Multi_Craft: 多工艺
Choose_Permission: 输入权限，输入'no'为不需要权限
Permission_Set_Title: 权限变更
Permission_Set: 权限已经设置为
Permission_No: 现在没有权限
no_permission_smelt:你没有合成这个物品的权限复制代码

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 2949848385 于 2017-7-21 10:51 编辑 

插件下载Spigot官网：
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/prorecipes-open-source.9039/
官网售价：0.99USD≈7rmb
当然你若支持不了作者可以通过下面的地址进行编译插件..嗯，插件开源的
github:
https://github.com/mcgrizzz/ProRecipes
最后首先这是我搬运的第一个插件，请大家多多支持支持~~~
最后，有什么建议在下面提出，谢谢大家=w=
作者的话   
    对于任何问题的消息
   我在发布新问题之前，请查看所有已解决和未解决的问题，以确保没有重复。
已知问题插件可以覆盖/ recipe命令和在制作过程中取消或修改的插件。
可堆叠物品插件与无形的配方
可关联插件1.ecoDrops  - 一个允许自定义怪物掉落的插件
2.Mythicmobs  - 让你创造出一些非常酷的物品
通过购买或下载此插件，您同意以下内容您不会重新分发插件
您不会反编译插件
你不会预扣退款
ProRecipes是我自己的知识产权，你不能试图去重现它，并声称它是你自己的作品。
你可能不会将插件转售给他人
我可以随时更改价格
任何不遵守本协议将导致法律诉讼。
原文内容你不会想看的:Supported Versions: 1.7-1.8 protocol hack,1.8 - 1.11
Java 7+ required
An advanced, yet easy to use, system to create items, create recipes and manage recipes. Create infinite possibilities for your server, release your creativity. 
What does it cost ? 
[size=14.6667px]Starting today (12/1/2016) You can pay whatever you want.

You can pay directly through spigot or if you want to pay a different amount go through this link if you want to support me.

IF you want to donate a specific amount, please give more than 3 cents, the fee itself for the transaction is 3 cents which nets a 0 cent donation.You also NEED to provide your spigot username where it asks for it. Nothing else. Please message me on spigot as well. 
Open Source
[size=14.6667px]If you don't want to pay, its source is available here. 

If you have development experience please feel free to submit code changes!

Test Servers:
mc.whoshenry.co.uk
[size=14.6667px]Huge amounts of custom items and recipes have been added to this server to create an amazing experience. 
play.maestrea.com
A very unique take on a classic towny and mcmmo server using ProRecipes for its crafting needs. 

 
For any issues message me
Before posting a new issue please review all resolved and unresolved issues to make sure there is no duplicate.

ProRecipes was designed with simplicity in mind. There are absolutely no configuration files that need to be opened for this to run flawlessly. With ProRecipes you can create recipes that are ItemMeta specific(shaped, shapeless, furnace, and multi-craft) in game. 

ItemMeta and NBTTag specific crafting. You're no longer limited by material, create endless combinations with different lores, display names, and NBTTags. ?Tutorial prompts courtesy of TitleManager. If you choose not to download this, you will still be prompted with text.?Easy in game GUIs to help guide you through every step.?An Item Builder to modify the display name, and lore of items in game.?A Recipe Builder to create shaped, shapeless, furnace, and multi-craft recipes in game.?Multi-crafting: Use a 4x4 grid to craft with up to 4 results!?A Recipe Manager to manage, and delete recipes in game.?A Recipe Blacklist to disable any recipes you don't want your players to be able to craft. This supports custom data values.?A Custom Item Viewer so you don't need to recreate any item that was previously created.?Lookup recipes in game?A recipe backup system so you don't lose your precious recipes if anything goes wrong. ?A Recipe pack system for fast and easy setup. Read more here ?Permissions per recipe support?Customizable prompts translate into any language and customize messages to your liking.?Update checker get notified when you need an update!?Support for NBTTags and MythicMobs?Developer API in case you want to have some fun with it too. You don't even need to purchase to use the API! ViewJavadocs.?Instant integration of recipes, and full time support of myself!?

/builditem or /bi - Open the Item Builder/recipe or /rec - Open the Recipe Builder/recipes or /recs - Open the Recipe Manager/recipes lookup or /rec lookup - Lookup the recipe for whatever you're holding/items or /it - Opens the Item Viewer

[size=14.6667px]?
prorecipes.createitem - Use the Item Builderprorecipes.createrecipe - Create a custom recipeprorecipes.managerecipes - View the recipesprorecipes.lookup - Look up recipesprorecipes.modifyrecipes - Edit the recipesprorecipes.viewitems - View custom itemsprorecipes.takeitem - Collect items in item viewerprorecipes.createtable - Create a multi-craft tableprorecipes.notifyupdate - Be notified on join if an update is available for ProRecipes

How to use is currently being updated, in the meantime here is a how-to video! 
[size=14.6667px]

Code (Text):

#Put 'false' if you're not using spigot
spigot: true

#This enables/disables any prompts that show
showPrompts: true

#This is the format that you should use when configuring the blacklist
#get names for items here
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/org/bukkit/Material.html
# Use '!' to define data values
# Don't use any data values if you want to block material
recipeBlacklist:
- emerald_block
- gold_block!2
- diamond_block!1
- wood!0
- wood!1


Messages.yml

Code (Text):

Item_Viewer_Title: Item Viewer
Item_Viewer_Prompt: Click a material to view its custom items
Item_Builder_Title: Item Builder
Item_Builder_Insert: Insert a desired itemstack to modify.
Item_Builder_Edit: You may edit the itemstack.
Item_Builder_Lore: Type desired lore to add in chat
Item_Builder_Name: Type desired display name in chat
Item_Builder_Done: Your item is in your inventory!
Recipe_Builder_Title: Recipe Builder
Recipe_Builder_MultiCraft_Title: Multi-Craft
Recipe_Builder_MultiCraft_Add: Add ingredients on left, results on right
Recipe_Builder_Empty: You cannot save an empty recipe
Recipe_Builder_Insert: Insert the desired result
Recipe_Builder_Add: Add your ingredients! Close to save recipe.
Recipe_Builder_Furnace: Add your source! Close to save recipe.
Recipe_Viewer_Title: Recipe Manager
Recipe_Viewer_Title2: Recipe Viewer
Recipe_Viewer_Prompt: View and manage recipes
Recipe_Viewer_Prompt2: View recipes
Recipe_Viewer_Edited: Recipe edited!
Recipe_Viewer_Deleted: Recipe deleted!
Furnace_Saved: Your furnace recipe has been saved!
Shapeless_Saved: Your shapeless recipe has been saved!
Shaped_Saved: Your shaped recipe has been saved!
Multi-Craft_Saved: Your multi-craft recipe has been saved!
Choose_Type: Choose the type of recipe
Multi_Craft_GUI: Multi-Craft Table
Mulit_Craft_Enter: Enter Recipe
Multi_Craft_View: View Recipe
Multi_Craft: Multi-Craft
Choose_Permission: Type a permission. Type 'no' for no permission
Permission_Set_Title: Permission Change
Permission_Set: Permission has been set to
Permission_No: There is now no permission
no_permission_smelt: You do not have permission to smelt this item.






[size=14.6667px]
Tutorial and Review by: KingofAstro


Update video by: KingofAstro?
[size=14.6667px]Known Caveats/Issues: 
Plugins that override the /recipe commands and plugins that cancel or modify on crafting.Stackable Items plugin with Shapeless recipes
[size=14.6667px]FAQ ?
Awesome plugins to work with this for extra functionality:
ecoDrops - a plugin to allow custom mobs dropsMythicMobs - lets you create some pretty sick items
[size=14.6667px]Credit for banner and titles : NitroFox0


NOTE: PM me or reply on the plugin thread with any issues you're having. Do not leave a bad review because you're having issues if you haven't contacted me and given me a chance to help you out.

You will not decompile the plugin
You will not preform a chargeback

Any failure to abide by this agreement will result in legal action.

[size=14.6667px]Leaving Reviews:
Reviews are a great way to give me feedback and inspriation to work harder for you. I love this community and a great review only gives me more drive to do more. Reviews really help out too! Before leaving a review please consider the following:?
Contact me with any issuesContact me with any requestsI am ALWAYS willing to accommodate and help out.
